description:
When Gao struggles to find a way to defeat Wisdom, Kiri tries to reignite his passion for Buddyfight by challenging him to a match. Meanwhile, Geargod and Wisdom clash over their attitudes towards Buddyfight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Thunder Empire of Friendship! Geargod Rebels?!
Yuujou no Kaminari Teigun Geargod Hanran!?
友情の雷帝軍 ギアゴッド反乱!?
